General.Name: Hainan Jinpan Smart Technology Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: Hainan Jinpan Smart Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of power transmission and distribution, and control equipment products for use in the fields of new energy, high-end equipment, efficiency energy saving and other fields in China. It offers dry-type transformers and reactors, medium and low voltage switchgears, box-type substations, inverter grid-connected devices, SVG and other transmission and distribution electric and control equipment products. The company serves transformers, rectifiers and inductors, distribution switch control, wind power, photovoltaic components, electrochemical energy storage system, and other equipment. It also exports its products to approximately 82 countries and regions. Hainan Jinpan Smart Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is based in Haikou, China.
